alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:51PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Lauderdale and east central Colbert Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 549 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Muscle Shoals. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Heavy Rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of water over roadways due to 1 to 3 inches of rainfall that has already fallen. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, St. Florian and Northwest Alabama Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
